name: places/ChIJjSiEZMBYwokRrzEoqY9YoJ4
formattedAddress: 1150 Park Ave #1-a, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1150 Park Ave #1-a, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text:
Torn first time patient here….
I’d like to give my visit a 4 or 5 stars, but I can not do so at this point.

On one hand, Dr Frenkel is a very nice man.
My first interaction with him, over the phone, was pleasant.

On the other hand: after my first visit: I have never been so rushed by a doctor.
Granted, I was a tad late, coming from another medical appointment that ran a bit late.

I had requested to have all the medical forms emailed to me so that I could fill them out in advance but the staff did not send them. So, I ended up having to fill them out in the waiting room while he took another regular patient who was scheduled after me!

He was in the room with me for less than 5 minutes and he did NOT listen to one word I said, talking over me and not paying attention to the answers I was giving to his few questions.

Painful exam on the table.
Once again, most likely because he was rushing through my visit….

His office staff is “challenging”; maybe it’s the language barrier, maybe it’s cultural….. they are on the very frosty side  but not in a “mean attitude” way… just not engaging at all.
They do not smile, barely look at you and their sternness can be off putting.

His nurse (L.) was as rushed as Dr Frenkel and botched by blood retrieval. That had only ever happened to me once in the past 40+ years of my life.
I gently told her to take her time & not rush while trying to insert a needle in my vein ( I have excellent veins, perfect for blood retrievals or IV lines, all medical practitioners joke about that) but she dismissed me by saying that she was not in a rush or rushing through her job….. while rushing to puncture my other arm to withdraw blood. Painful again.
I tried to make basic small talk to be pleasant. No reaction whatsoever…..

Will I go back to this medical practice: yes because my experience in the exam room could have been an one off and I’d hate to miss out on a good practitioner since, based on several of his other patients’ reviews, Dr Frenkel is a good doctor to them.
I only wish I could have made the same positive statements after my very first visit.

originalText.text: Dr. Frenkel has given me the most amazing experience during my first pregnancy. My husband and I absolutely love him. I couldn’t have asked for better. Any time we had any concerns or worries he was always a phone call away. His Brooklyn and Manhattan staff are all sweet and pleasant to deal with. My delivery was the best experience of my life and I really do believe that most of that was due to him. 5 stars all around. The BEST.

text.text: Dr. Frenkel has given me the most amazing experience during my first pregnancy. My husband and I absolutely love him. I couldn’t have asked for better. Any time we had any concerns or worries he was always a phone call away. His Brooklyn and Manhattan staff are all sweet and pleasant to deal with. My delivery was the best experience of my life and I really do believe that most of that was due to him. 5 stars all around. The BEST.

originalText.text: The office staff is great! Helpful and accommodating, appointments are always on time. I originally used ZocDoc to book my first appointment which was very easy and convenient but phoning in was just was easy.     Dr. Frenkel is experienced and very knowledgeable. I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a trustworthy OB/GYN. He is caring to all his patients, I love that he was able to answer all of my questions/concerns fully and made sure that I was comfortable.

originalText.text: My appointment was on time and test done in a very friendly and professional manner. I'd definitely recommend this office for anyone looking for OB/GYN. Dr. Frenkel uses Zocdoc, to book your appointment, which is great.  Skillful, experienced, knowledgeable, caring doctor friendly with his patients. Nice to have found somebody like him and his office staff.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Frenkel for 3 years now. He is an excellent and caring physician. He is a straight shooter and keeps you well informed about your health.Unlike larger practices, he took care of me during my pregnancy and delivered by child.
